problem: A particular string resonates in four loops at a frequency of 240 Hz. Give at least three other frequencies at which it will resonate. What is each called?

steps.explanation: Four loops correspond to the fourth harmonic, so f₁ = f₄/4 = 60 Hz.
List other resonant frequencies and their names: f₂=120 Hz (first overtone/second harmonic), f₃=180 Hz (second overtone/third harmonic), f₅=300 Hz (fourth overtone/fifth harmonic).
